# Tender for Fourier Transform Infrared Spectrometer (FTIR) Instrumentation

**Reference Number**: cb-526-93335413
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000079672
**Publication Date**: February 7, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: February 22, 2024, at 14:00 EST
**Expected Contract Start Date**: February 22, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024

## Description
Natural Resources Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, and accessories, services, and supplies. The tender notice is exclusively reserved for holders of the above-mentioned Supply Arrangement.

## Requirements
The successful supplier will be required to deliver one FTIR spectrometer, install, verify, and familiarize the instrument.

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact Bianca Moore at bianca.moore@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca or (613) 323-0520.

## Tender Documents
The tender package can be accessed at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31520/nrcan-5000079672-npp_0.pdf

## Notice Type
This is a Competitive Traditional RFP.

## Procurement Category
Goods and Services.

## Procurement Method
Lowest Price.

## Limited Tendering Reason
None.

## Trade Agreements
None.

## Regions of Opportunity
Ottawa.

## Regions of Delivery
Canada.
